DOC.brief_title: High Protein Breakfast Postprandial Glycemia T2D ( PBD )
DOC.detailed_description: It show increase protein breakfast result reduce overall postprandial glycemia obese individual This study undertaken evaluate whether compare protein like tuna , eggs soy , intake whey protein breakfast effective reduce overall postprandial glycemia ( PPHG ) T2D individual .
